name: Pop N' Pals
description:
Pop N' Pals is a networked playground for you and your friends! Pop and the pals play together in a happy, fun world filled with hats and other toys. Join the game along with some friends and you'll all be added to the same lobby.

*There's currently a hard limit of one server and 20 concurrent players so if you end up stuck on a black screen, try again later.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Use WASD and Space to select a color and begin
  • WASD controls movement
  • Mouse controls camera
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to kick
  • Right click to bite/climb
  • Q/E to wobble

Xbox Controller Controls:

  • Left stick and A to select a color and begin
  • Left stick for movement
  • Right stick for camera
  • A to jump
  • X to kick
  • Triggers to bite/climb
  • Bumpers to wobble

I'd love to hear about your playtime at @chriswade__ or see snapshots taken in game at @PopNPals
